name: Tomato Basil Soup 🥗
description: Dive into a bowl of this comforting Tomato Basil Soup that's bursting with flavor! It's the perfect dish to warm you up on a chilly day, and it's so easy to make, you'll be whipping it up in no time.
instructions: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, celery, and garlic and sauté for 3 minutes, until the onion is translucent.
Add the salt, pepper, tomato paste, basil, crushed tomatoes, veggie broth, baking soda, and thyme. Bring to a boil.
Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Use an immersion or countertop blender to blend the soup until smooth. Let cool for 2 minutes.
Ladle the soup into bowls and garnish with more basil.
